io.leonis.zosma.math.ai

Interface Boid<O extends Spatial & Moving>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleBoid

    public interface Boid<O extends Spatial & Moving>
    The Interface Boid. This interface represents the functionality of a flocking algorithm.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray respond(O currentBoid, java.util.Set<? extends O> otherBoids, double avoidanceScale, double velocityRange, double centeringScale)
      Returns a velocity vector for a specific boid, given a set of other boids and tuning parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • respond

        org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray respond(O currentBoid,
                                             java.util.Set<? extends O> otherBoids,
                                             double avoidanceScale,
                                             double velocityRange,
                                             double centeringScale)
        Returns a velocity vector for a specific boid, given a set of other boids and tuning parameters.
        Parameters:
        currentBoid - The boid to compute the velocity vector for.
        otherBoids - A set of Boids.
        avoidanceScale - The tuning parameter for the collision avoidance rule.
        velocityRange - The tuning parameter for the velocity matching rule.
        centeringScale - The tuning parameter for the flock centering rule.
        Returns:
        A velocity vector representing the suggested velocity for the specified boid such that the flock exhibits flocking behavior.
